alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 08 at 12:19PM PST until January 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM MONDAY TO 10 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches 6000 to 8000 feet, 1 to 2 feet from 8000 to 9500 feet, and 2 to 5 feet above 9500 feet. Southwest winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes. * WHEN...From 4 AM Monday to 10 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible into the southern Sierra. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some areas could see reduced visibility due to blowing snow. Gusty winds and heavy snow could result in increased avalanche danger.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
